meanings.definition: Feeling or showing unease or discomfort
meanings.sent1: The dark, spooky forest was the qualmiest place I had ever been.
meanings.sent2: The loud thunderstorm made me feel qualmiest as I curled up under my blanket.
meanings.sent3: The qualmiest part of the haunted house was the creaky staircase.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the graveyard was the qualmiest feeling I had ever experienced.
meanings.sent5: The shadowy figure in the alley gave me the qualmiest sensation of being watched.

meanings.definition: Causing or likely to cause unease or discomfort
meanings.sent1: The creepy doll had the qualmiest expression on its face.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had a qualmiest aura that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent3: The qualmiest part of the horror movie was when the ghost appeared unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The eerie music in the background added to the qualmiest atmosphere of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The sudden chill in the air was the qualmiest sign that something was amiss.
